keyMoments.title: Depart Punk Hazard
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hat Pirates sail away from Punk Hazard on the Thousand Sunny with their allies Law, Caesar Clown, Kin'emon, and Momonosuke.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the conclusion of the Punk Hazard Arc and the beginning of the journey to Dressrosa as part of the alliance with Law.

keyMoments.title: Learn Full Alliance Plan
keyMoments.description: The crew learns the complete details of Law's plan to take down Doflamingo and destroy the SMILE factory.
keyMoments.significance: The Straw Hats commit to the full scope of the alliance, understanding their role in the larger plan to eventually take down Kaido.

keyMoments.title: Alliance Departs Punk Hazard
keyMoments.description: Law travels with the Straw Hats as they depart Punk Hazard together, solidifying their alliance.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the Heart Pirates' commitment to the alliance and sets up their joint operation in Dressrosa.

keyMoments.title: Law Reveals Strategic Plan
keyMoments.description: Law explains the full strategic plan to use Caesar Clown as leverage and destroy the SMILE factory.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Law's strategic leadership in the alliance and his long-term planning to take down Kaido.

keyMoments.title: Doflamingo Confronts Kuzan
keyMoments.description: Doflamingo attempts to kill Smoker but is frozen by Kuzan. He breaks free but chooses not to fight the former Admiral.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew leader's pragmatism and decision-making. Also demonstrates their awareness of Kuzan's mysterious activities.

keyMoments.title: Donquixote Pirates Depart Punk Hazard
keyMoments.description: Doflamingo leaves Punk Hazard with Buffalo and Baby 5, acknowledging he needs to adjust his plans.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the crew's withdrawal from Punk Hazard and their return to Dressrosa, setting up the next arc's conflict.
